name: Soldier
description: A medium humanoid with solid armor and a strong presence on the battlefield, utilizing a spear and heavy crossbow for both melee and ranged combat.
memorable: Their Tactical Movement ability allows them to reposition without fear of opportunity attacks, indicating strategic combat proficiency.
goals: To engage in combat and leverage teamwork for tactical advantage.
relations: Often found alongside other military-themed creatures or in organized combat units.
environment: Typically encountered in military settings or during skirmishes.
strengths: Good melee and ranged combat capabilities with decent hit points.
weaknesses: Lower Dexterity leaves them vulnerable to agile foes, with only average social skills.
attacks: Wields a spear for melee or ranged attacks and can shoot a heavy crossbow at distant foes.
most_powerful_ability: Tactical Movement allows for strategic repositioning without provoking opportunity attacks.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 12, indicating a basic awareness of surroundings.
skills: Competent in Perception and Survival, aiding in awareness and navigation.
additional_information: Strength and Constitution modifiers contribute to solid combat performance.
Team-oriented, gaining bonuses from allies in close proximity.
Capable of effective damage output with melee and ranged attacks.
test_queries: medium combatant using spear and crossbow
versatile soldier adept in melee and ranged combat
